name: part_006
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】「別世界」⧸ Amane Kanata 3DLIVE ＂Another world＂【#天音かなた3周年LIVE ⧸ ホロライブ】 [szUbg1Yar5c]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Introduction to the performance of 'Ano Natsu ga Houwa suru'. Amane Kanata stands on stage with a shadow figure representing the other character in the song.
Amane Kanata performs 'Ano Natsu ga Houwa suru'. The song tells a tragic story of two outcasts running away together after a crime.

subtitles.original: 昨日、人を殺したんだ。
subtitles.english: Yesterday, I killed someone.

subtitles.original: 隣の席の、いつもいじめてくるあいつ。
subtitles.english: That guy in the seat next to mine who was always bullying me.

subtitles.original: もう嫌になって、肩を突き飛ばして、
subtitles.english: I'd finally had enough and shoved his shoulder,

subtitles.original: 打ち所が悪かったんだ。
subtitles.english: and he just hit the wrong spot.

subtitles.original: もうここにはいられないし、
subtitles.english: I can't stay here anymore,

subtitles.original: どっか遠いとこで死んでくるよ。
subtitles.english: so I'm going to die somewhere far away.

subtitles.original: そんな君に僕は言った。
subtitles.english: I said to you then,

subtitles.original: 「それじゃ僕も連れてって」
subtitles.english: "In that case, take me with you."

subtitles.original: 財布を持って、ナイフを持って、
subtitles.english: Taking my wallet, taking a knife,

subtitles.original: 携帯ゲームも鞄に詰めて。
subtitles.english: and stuffing my handheld game into my bag.

subtitles.original: いらないものは全部壊していこう。
subtitles.english: Let's destroy everything we don't need.

subtitles.original: あの写真も、あの日記も、
subtitles.english: That photo, that diary,

subtitles.original: 今となっちゃもういらないさ。
subtitles.english: they're all useless now.

subtitles.original: 人殺しと駄目人間。
subtitles.english: A murderer and a good-for-nothing.

subtitles.original: 君と僕の旅だ。
subtitles.english: This is your and my journey.

subtitles.original: 君と僕の旅だ。
subtitles.english: This is your and my journey.

subtitles.original: そして僕らは逃げ出した。
subtitles.english: And so we ran away.

subtitles.original: この狭い狭いこの世界から。
subtitles.english: From this small, small world.

subtitles.original: 家族もクラスの奴らも、何もかも全部捨てて君と二人で。
subtitles.english: Leaving behind family and classmates, leaving everything behind, just the two of us.

subtitles.original: 遠い遠い誰もいない場所で二人で死のう。
subtitles.english: In a far, far place where no one else is, let's die together.

subtitles.original: もうこの世界に価値などないよ。
subtitles.english: There's no longer any value in this world.

subtitles.original: 人殺しなんてそこら中湧いてるじゃんか。
subtitles.english: Murderers are popping up everywhere anyway.

subtitles.original: 君は何も悪くないよ。
subtitles.english: You haven't done anything wrong.

subtitles.original: 君は何も悪くないよ。
subtitles.english: You haven't done anything wrong.

subtitles.original: 結局僕ら誰にも愛されたことなどなかったんだ。
subtitles.english: In the end, neither of us had ever been loved.

subtitles.original: そんな嫌な共通点で僕らは簡単に信じ合ってきた。
subtitles.english: With that unpleasant commonality, we easily came to trust each other.

subtitles.original: 君の手を握った時、微かな震えも既になくなっていて。
subtitles.english: When I held your hand, even that slight trembling was already gone.

subtitles.original: 誰にも縛られないで二人、線路の上を歩いた。
subtitles.english: Bound by no one, the two of us walked along the train tracks.

subtitles.original: 金を盗んで二人で逃げて、どこへでも行ける気がしたんだ。
subtitles.english: Stealing money and running away together, I felt like we could go anywhere.

subtitles.original: 今更怖いものは僕らにはなかったんだ。
subtitles.english: There was nothing left for us to be afraid of now.

subtitles.original: 額の汗も、落ちた眼鏡も、今となっちゃどうでもいいさ。
subtitles.english: The sweat on our brows, the glasses that fell off, none of it matters now.

subtitles.original: 溢れ者の小さな、
subtitles.english: The small flight from reality

subtitles.original: 逃避行の旅だ。
subtitles.english: of two outcasts.

subtitles.original: いつか夢見た優しくて、誰にでも好かれる主人公なら。
subtitles.english: If I were the kind, well-liked protagonist I once dreamed of...

subtitles.original: 汚くなった僕たちも見捨てずにちゃんと救ってくれるのかな。
subtitles.english: Would they save even us, who've become so stained, without abandoning us?

subtitles.original: そんな夢はもう捨てたよ。だって現実を見ろよ。幸せは...
subtitles.english: I've already thrown away such dreams. Because look at reality. Happiness is...

subtitles.original: 四文字なんてなかったんだ。今までの人生で思い知ったじゃないか。
subtitles.english: That four-character word didn't exist. Haven't we learned that through our lives?

subtitles.original: 自分は何も悪くないと、誰もがきっと思ってる。
subtitles.english: Everyone surely thinks that they haven't done anything wrong.

subtitles.original: 宛てもなく彷徨う、蝉の群れに。
subtitles.english: Wandering aimlessly among swarms of cicadas.

subtitles.original: 水も無くなり、揺れ出す視界に。
subtitles.english: Running out of water, my vision begins to waver.

subtitles.original: 迫り来る、鬼たちの怒号に。
subtitles.english: Amidst the approaching roars of demons.

subtitles.original: 馬鹿みたいにはしゃぎ合い、ふと君はナイフを取った。
subtitles.english: Foolishly making merry together, you suddenly picked up a knife.

subtitles.original: 君が今まで傍にいたから、ここまで来れたんだ。
subtitles.english: It's because you were by my side until now that I was able to make it this far.

subtitles.original: だからもういいよ。もういいよ。
subtitles.english: So it's okay now. It's okay.

subtitles.original: 死ぬのは私一人でいいよ。
subtitles.english: I should be the only one to die.

subtitles.original: そして君は首を切った。
subtitles.english: And then you slit your throat.

subtitles.original: まるで何かの映画のワンシーンだ。
subtitles.english: It was just like a scene from some movie.

subtitles.original: 白昼夢を見ている気がした。
subtitles.english: I felt like I was having a daydream.

subtitles.original: 気付けば僕は捕まって。
subtitles.english: Next thing I knew, I was caught.

subtitles.original: 君がどこにも見つからなくって、
subtitles.english: And I couldn't find you anywhere,

subtitles.original: 君だけがどこにもいなくって。
subtitles.english: you were the only one nowhere to be found.

subtitles.original: そして時は過ぎて行った。あの暑い暑い日が過ぎて行った。
subtitles.english: And so time passed by. Those hot, hot days passed by.

subtitles.original: 家族もクラスの奴らもいるのに、何故か君だけがどこにもいない。
subtitles.english: Family and classmates are still around, yet for some reason, only you are nowhere to be found.

subtitles.original: あの夏の日のことを思い出す。僕は今も今でも歌ってる。
subtitles.english: I remember that summer day. I'm still singing even now.

subtitles.original: 君をずっと探しているんだ。君に言いたいことがあるんだ。
subtitles.english: I'm searching for you always. There's something I want to tell you.

subtitles.original: 九月の終わりにくしゃみして、
subtitles.english: Sneezing at the end of September,

subtitles.original: 六月の雨の匂いを繰り返す。
subtitles.english: repeating the scent of the June rain.

subtitles.original: 君の笑顔は、君の無邪気さは、頭の中を飽和している。
subtitles.english: Your smile, your innocence, they saturate my mind.

subtitles.original: 誰も何も悪くないよ。
subtitles.english: No one did anything wrong.

subtitles.original: 君は何も悪くないから。
subtitles.english: Because you haven't done anything wrong.

subtitles.original: もういいよ、投げ出してしまおう。そう言って欲しかったのだろう。
subtitles.english: It's okay now, let's just give it all up. That must have been what you wanted someone to say.
